Called by HTMLWidgets to produce the widget's root element

Source: R/reactable.R
widget_html.reactable.Rd

Called by HTMLWidgets to produce the widget's root element

Usage

widget_html.reactable(id, style, class, ...)

Arguments

id

Element ID.

style

Element style.

class

Element class.

...

Additional arguments.
